amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008.

action.text: Amendment (A048) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 237 (Roll no. 447).
